capability.name: Fraud Evaluation
capability.definition: The service domain executes fraud behavioral pattern tests to detect possible fraudulent transactions/activity
capability.role: This service domain handles the structured execution of fraud detection tests/routines that are used to identify possible fraud by detecting out of pattern behaviors. The tests may run in-line with production or may access transaction logs as appropriate. Detected anomalies are passed for further analysis and resolution.
capability.example: Card transactions are subjected to an array of fraud pattern test to detect 'out of pattern' behavior - anomalies are highlighted for analysis

key_features.name: Transaction data consolidation
key_features.description: Enables transaction data consolidation to support the service domain executes fraud behavioral pattern tests to detect possible fraudulent transactions/activity

key_features.name: Fraud detection test execution
key_features.description: Enables fraud detection test execution to support the service domain executes fraud behavioral pattern tests to detect possible fraudulent transactions/activity

key_features.name: Fraud analysis/diagnosis and reporting
key_features.description: Enables fraud analysis/diagnosis and reporting to support the service domain executes fraud behavioral pattern tests to detect possible fraudulent transactions/activity
